DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetics ( body medication ) JNJ-42396302 , JNJ-53773187 JNJ-42692507 administration single oral dose 100 microgram fast condition healthy male participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Pharmacokinetics JNJ-42396302 , JNJ-53773187 JNJ-42692507 Healthy Male Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This phase I , open-label ( people know identity intervention ) parallel-group ( group patient treat time ) , randomize ( study medication assign chance ) study healthy male participant , investigate pharmacokinetics single oral dose 100 micrograms JNJ-42396302 , JNJ-53773187 JNJ-42692507 . The study consist 3 phase , ie , screen phase ( 21 day prior first dose study medication ) , treatment phase , follow phase . In treatment phase , participant divide 3 treatment group 6 participant , receive single dose 100 micrograms JNJ-42396302 , JNJ-53773187 JNJ-42692507 follow overnight fast least 10 hour . Safety evaluation adverse event , clinical laboratory test , physical examination , vital sign electrocardiogram monitor throughout study . The total duration study approximately 4 week .
DOC.criteria: Participant healthy male basis physical examination , medical history , vital sign , electrocardiogram , result blood biochemistry hematology test urinalysis Participant must Body Mass Index 18.5 30.0 kg/m2 Have blood pressure 90 140 mm Hg systolic , inclusive , high 90 mm Hg diastolic Agrees protocoldefined use effective contraception A positive human immunodeficiency virustype 1 type 2 test Hepatitis A , B C infection screen admission Participant abnormal physical , vital laboratory value Currently active cardiovascular , bronchospastic respiratory disease , dyspnea , diabetes mellitus , movement disorder infectious disease
